item.title: Iterator Pattern in trees
item.description: Implementing the iterator pattern in Java

item.title: Glasses
item.description: A web application to detect whether the user is wearing glasses or not. In this project, I have used resnet50 model and fine-tuned the model on the dataset made from scarping google-images. Also visualize the prediction of the model using saliency map technique. Project is open for feedback and contribution at Github
